title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

tagsArrayGroupOne.markdownDescription:
**tagsArrayGroupOne**

Array of all group one defined keywords.

Highlights the keyword tag only.

decoratorOptions.markdownDescription:
**decoratorOptions**

Decorator options to apply to this keyword.

backgroundColor.markdownDescription:
**backgroundColor**

Sets the background color for this keyword.

outline.markdownDescription:
**outline**

Sets the outline style for this keyword.

border.markdownDescription:
**border**

This property is a shorthand for the following CSS properties:

_border-color_

_border-style_

_border-width_

borderColor.markdownDescription:
**borderColor**

Sets the border color for this keyword.

borderRadius.markdownDescription:
**borderRadius**

Adds rounded corners to this keywords background color.

borderWidth.markdownDescription:
**borderWidth**

Sets the border width of this keyword.

fontStyle.markdownDescription:
**fontStyle**

Sets font style for this keywords text.

fontWeight.markdownDescription:
**fontWeight**

Sets font weight for this keywords text.

textDecoration.markdownDescription:
**textDecoration**

Sets the decorations of this keyword.

cursor.markdownDescription:
**cursor**

Sets the cursor icon of this keyword.

color.markdownDescription:
**color**

Sets the text color for this keyword.

letterSpacing.markdownDescription:
**letterSpacing**

Sets the text letter spacing for this keyword.

gutterIconPath.markdownDescription:
**gutterIconPath**

Sets the _gutter icon_ for this keyword.

Note: can be an absolute path.

gutterIconSize.markdownDescription:
**gutterIconSize**

Sets the _gutter icon size_ for this keyword.

tagsArrayGroupTwo.markdownDescription:
**tagsArrayGroupTwo**

Array of all group two defined keywords.

Highlights the keyword tag and all the following text to the end of line.

tagBlocksArray.markdownDescription:
**tagBlocksArray**

Array of all defined tag blocks.

description.markdownDescription:
**description**

Brief description of the tag block.

startText.markdownDescription:
**startText**

Text string to identify the start of the tag block.

endText.markdownDescription:
**endText**

Text string to identify the end of the tag block.

isEnabled.markdownDescription:
**isEnabled**

extensions.markdownDescription:
**extensions**

Array of all supported file extensions to highlight.

description.markdownDescription:
**description**

Description of the comments Regular Expression.

ext.markdownDescription:
**ext**

Array of extensions that use this comment definition.

anyOf.markdownDescription: File extension that support this comments regular expression.

commentsRegEx.markdownDescription:
**commentsRegEx**

Regular Expression used to search for comments (escaped backslash required).
